content.raw: Thanks for weighing in, @heather_benz . I agree it's best to expose the functionality that the teams want both in the API and in the GUI. That way, they can easily design experiments using the GUI and then automate them using the API. And if teams don't trust themselves to enter the right filename in a script, they can choose to rely on the GUI.
